message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $12800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. I can offer $12400. Can you consider this price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I can offer it to you for $12600. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12400. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $12000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. Can you reconsider?
